title: Ep 35: Serena Wolf
itunes:title: Ep 35: Serena Wolf
itunes:subtitle: Author and chef Serena Wolf is here and she brought the multi-purpose kitchen tool of her dreams and all of yours. Turns out I already had it in my kitchen so I am extra excited! She also teaches me about Chi Chi’s foldable wraps (I screamed), and just...
description:
Author and chef Serena Wolf is here and she brought the multi-purpose kitchen tool of her dreams and all of yours. Turns out I already had it in my kitchen so I am extra excited! She also teaches me about Chi Chi’s foldable wraps (I screamed), and just like, so many things I wanted to know about food but was afraid (too dumb) to ask!


(Follow Gee Thanks! on Insta: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod) 


PS -- SAVE THE DATE! On Sunday, July 26 at 11:30am (yep, this Sunday!), Serena and I are going live on IG to cook brunch together using the tool she brought to the show today! She does this for a living so you’re in good hands (with her. With me? No). Follow @GeeThanksJustBoughtItPod and @SerenaGWolf so you don’t miss it!


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • Chi Chi’s Foldable Wraps: https://fave.co/2Bo6ipR
  • Garlic Smell Soap: https://amzn.to/30FDGB9 
  • Microplane: https://amzn.to/30IOD4K
  • Yeti Tumblers: https://amzn.to/3jz7gkA
  • The Dude Diet by Serena Wolf: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9780062854704
  • Cherry Pitter: https://amzn.to/32NqxIN 


Visit www.geethanksjustboughtit.com for even more recs and shop the Gee Thanks! Store: https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736. 








Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
